alert.note: Alert for Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 21 at 1:20AM MST until September 21 at 11:45PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Arizona, including the following areas, Northwest Plateau and the Arizona Strip. * WHEN...Through 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of washes, creeks, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Deep moisture spreading over northwest Arizona and the tendency for developing thunderstorms to move repeatedly over the same area today on the Arizona Strip will lead to the potential for heavy rain in a short amount of time. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
